description: This week, our first place winner on the insightful side is Thad with a comment on our post about Democrats moving from fact-checking to vibe-checking: I think describing it as “vibes” is reductive. The vibe is certainly part of it, but it’s not just about vibes. It’s about substance, too. When we talk about how […]
title: Funniest/Most Insightful Comments Of The Week At Techdirt
